message: I understand you want to be fair, but inflation hurts my gains more than yours. Let's find a compromise.
Considering inflation, this is a more reasonable split.
This is a better deal for you than last round, considering your value stays constant.  Time is running out!
You're right, time is running out. This is my most generous offer yet.
Okay, Alice.  Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution.  Take it or leave it.
